name: Freon Drevan
Lore: 'Xexto who had his business license revoked when his partner siphoned away his credits, fled the system, and left him with the tax debt.',
Text: 'Cancels game text of opponent''s accountants and tax collectors at same or adjacent site. While in a battle at a site, your battle destiny draws may not be canceled, and you may not draw more than two battle destiny.',
